Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.2-9, affected by CVE-2024-28180
